query.value: $filter=Invoicecrdate gt datetime'@{activity('Old Watermark Value').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and Invoicecrdate le datetime'@{variables('prevDate')}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX( CONCAT( CAST(Invoicecrdate as date),' ',(Invoicecrtime)) ) as maxValue FROM [dbo].[InvoiceSalesDataQA]

sqlReaderQuery.value: select MAX(Invoicecrtime) as maxTime FROM [dbo].[InvoiceSales] where Invoicecrdate= ( select MAX(Invoicecrdate ) FROM [dbo].[InvoiceSales])
select MAX(Invoicecrtime) as maxTime FROM [dbo].[InvoiceSales] where Invoicecrdate= ( select MAX(Invoicecrdate ) FROM [dbo].[InvoiceSales])
